import React from 'react' import { Container,Row, Col,ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap'; import {WiWindDeg,WiThermometer, WiStrongWind, WiBarometer, WiCloud, WiHumidity, WiRain,WiSnow} from 'react-icons/wi'; const DetailCurrentForecast = ({ sunrise, sunset, moonrise, moonset, moon_phase, //---------- pressure, humidity, wind_speed, wind_deg, wind_gust, clouds, temp_night, temp_eve, temp_morn, feels_like_day, feels_like_night, feels_like_eve, feels_like_morn, rain, pop, snow, }) => { return (
{/* temp, humidity ... */} Tempurature Matin{temp_morn}° Midi{temp_eve}° Soirée{temp_night}° Ressenti Matin{feels_like_morn}° Journée{feels_like_day}° Soirée{feels_like_eve}° nuit{feels_like_night}° Vent Vitesse{wind_speed} Km/h {wind_gust ? Rafale{wind_gust} Km/h : ""} Direction {wind_deg}° Pression {pressure} hPa Humidité {humidity} % Nuage {clouds} % {rain ? Pluie {rain}mm ({pop})% : ''} {snow ? Neige {snow}mm : ''} {/* sunrise moonrise */} ) } export default DetailCurrentForecast
